'''"Spantamad Flag"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Spantamad Flag" was temporarily obtainable by reaching 300 [[A Parade of Providence#Gala Excitement|Gala Excitement]] during the [[A Parade of Providence]] Event in [[Version 3.6]], and was permanently added to the [[Realm Depot]] stock in [[Version 3.8]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|type          = Creation
|time          = 16h
|Adhigama Wood = 6
|Fabric        = 6
|sort          = Adhigama Wood;Fabric
}}
